alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Tallahassee, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Tallahassee, Wakulla, Ralford Greenway, Apalachee Regional Park, Cody, Goose Pasture, Chaires Crossroads, Baum, Thomas City, Vereen, Capitola, Fallschase, Chaires, Southwood, Fanlew, Wacissa, Lloyd, Wacissa Springs and Tom Brown Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
